General.Name: Mahaka Media Tbk
General.Description: PT Mahaka Media Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates as a multiplatform media company in Indonesia and internationally. It engages in making, selling, collecting, and distributing community contents through various platforms. The company publishes Harian Republika Daily, a Moslem newspaper; Republika Penerbit, which specializes in Islamic books; Mahaka Publishing, which specializes in public books; Alif Republika, which specializes in children's books; Republika Digital Publishing for digital books; Rekomika for comic books; Buku Republika for books in collaboration with a third party; and Harian Indonesia, a Chinese-language newspaper. It also operates Jak TV, a television station; and various commercial radio stations, including NOICE, JAK FM, Gen FM, Gen FM Surabaya, Hot FM, Mustang FM, Most FM, and Kis FM. In addition, the company offers outdoor advertising media services; brand activation, creative agency, and event organizing services; building management, software development, television broadcasting, and communication equipment and general trading services; Web3/NFTs projects; and loyalty program services under the CardPlus name. Further, it provides online services through republika.id, bukurepublika.id, ihram.co.id, and Republika.co.id. The company was formerly known as PT Abdi Bangsa Tbk and changed its name to PT Mahaka Media Tbk in May 2010. PT Mahaka Media Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
